cast.name: 艾米丽·布鲁尼 Emily Bruni

writer.name: 威廉·布里奇斯 William Bridges

director.name: 威廉·布里奇斯 William Bridges

introduction: When newly elected MP Richard Dove runs over a young girl on a deserted forest road he fatally decides to bury her in the woods and save his blossoming career. But when he returns to his car he finds the girl's mother desperately searching for her daughter. She recognises him and asks for his help unaware of the dark secret he is keeping.. Richard must now lead the mother on a search through the forest for the girl he has just buried, but with every attempt to convince the mother to leave the woods the closer they get to the grave.
